arts.ttl: Two crucial concerns for Xabi Alonso to address ahead of Rayo Vallecano clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid head into their upcoming clash with Rayo Vallecano facing a number of problems, and the latest blow has come in the form of Aurelien Tchouameni’s injury. The midfielder’s setback comes at a crucial time, joining Franco Mastantuono, Dani Carvajal and Antonio Rudiger on the sidelines. His absence is particularly significant because of his […] The post Two crucial concerns for Xabi Alonso to address ahead of Rayo Vallecano clash appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Sidelined Real Madrid star could return to face Rayo Vallecano
